revisions.*: == Welcome to Wikipedia == '''Welcome!''' Hello, and [[Wikipedia:Introduction|welcome]] to Wikipedia! Thank you for [[Special:Contributions/97.83.80.223|your contributions]]. I hope you like the place and decide to stay. Here are some pages you might like to see: * [[Wikipedia:Five pillars|The five pillars of Wikipedia]] * [[Help:Contents|Help pages]] * [[Wikipedia:Tutorial|Tutorial]] * [[Wikipedia:How to edit a page|How to edit a page]] and [[Wikipedia:Article development|How to develop articles]] * [[Wikipedia:Your first article|How to create your first article]] (using the [[Wikipedia:Article wizard|Article Wizard]] if you wish) * [[Wikipedia:Manual of Style|Manual of Style]] You are welcome to continue editing without [[Special:Userlogin|logging in]], but many editors recommend that you '''[{{fullurl:Special:Userlogin|type=signup}} create an account]'''. Doing so is free, requires no personal information, and provides several benefits such as the ability to create articles. For a full outline and explanation of the benefits that come with creating an account, please see [[Wikipedia:Why create an account?|this page]]. If you edit without a username, your [[IP address]] (97.83.80.223) is used to identify you instead. In any case, I hope you enjoy editing here and being a [[Wikipedia:Wikipedians|Wikipedian]]! Please [[Wikipedia:Signatures|sign your comments]] on talk pages using four tildes (~~~~); this will automatically produce your IP address (or username if you're logged in) and the date. If you need help, check out [[Wikipedia:Questions]], ask me on [[User talk:WOLfan112|my talk page]], or ask your question and then place {{[[:Category:Wikipedians looking for help|helpme]]}} before the question on this page. Again, welcome! [[User:WOLfan112|UserWOLfan112]] [[User talk:WOLfan112|Talk]] 16:28, 26 March 2012 (UTC)
